custom-resource.description: Arquivo de configuracao do CLSi para o projeto de integracao

jdbc-resource.description: Ligacao JNDI com Band Folha Pagamento
Ligacao JNDI com DW BI Clusterizacao

system-property.name: JMS_PROVIDER_PORT
system-property.description: Port Number that JMS Service will listen for remote clients connection.

property.name: sql-group
property.value: select distinct FUREFERENCIA from CLSIVPERMISSAO per inner join CLSIVFUNCIONALIDADE f on f.FUID @ per.PMFUNCIONALIDADE inner join CLSIVPERFIL pe on pe.PFID @ per.PMPERFIL inner join CLSIVUSUARIO u on u.USPERFIL @ per.PMPERFIL where u.USLOGIN @ ? order by f.FUREFERENCIA

system-property.name: JMS_PROVIDER_PORT
system-property.description: Port Number that JMS Service will listen for remote clients connection.
